message.content: {"id": "11863", "title": "Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal", "description": "When performing the 'Update Test Suite' action, I am unable to remove any tests from the test suite. The action only allows for the recreation of the test suite based on the selection made in the dialog. Specifically, this issue occurs when updating a test suite that currently contains X number of tests.", "OB": "The 'Update Test Suite' action does not provide an option to remove tests from the test suite.", "EB": "The 'Update Test Suite' action should allow users to remove tests from the test suite if desired.", "SR": "Modify the 'Update Test Suite' action to include the functionality to remove tests from the test suite."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11863', 'title': 'Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'What the action actually does is RECREATE the test suite based on the selectionin the dialog.I do an update on a test suite which contains X. '}
